title: Suzuki Motorcycle India reports 8.3 pc rise in Aug sales
description: Domestic sales in August 2022 were at 64,654 units as against 61,809 units in the same month last year, Suzuki Motorcycle India Pvt Ltd (SMIPL) said in a statement.
